questions.question: Was this application completed by the insurance agent?
What best describes your business’s ownership structure?

options.label: More than one of the above

questions.question: Describe your business’s interest of the building at 912 Noyes St

hint: Tenant = A tenant is an individual or business that has a lease agreement with the owner of a building or property. The tenant pays rent in exchange for the right to occupy or use the property.

Home-based office - Residence = A home-based office (residence) is an office that is located within a private residence. This type of office allows business owners to conduct business operations from their own home.

Condo commercial unit owner = A condominium commercial unit owner is a business owner who owns a commercial space within a condominium complex. They may operate their business out of this condo unit or lease this space out to another business.

Commercial building owner = A commercial building owner is a business owner who owns a commercial property. They may operate their business out of this building or lease this space out to another business.

questions.question: Does your business want to add building coverage for one or more of its locations?

hint: Building coverage
**Building coverage** is separate from **business property coverage**.
* **Building coverage** typically includes permanent machinery, equipment and fixtures.
* **Business property coverage** typically includes office equipment, furniture, computers, etc.
A Business Owner's Policy (BOP) typically includes business property coverage, but does not include building coverage.

questions.question: What is the __replacement cost__ of the __building__ at 912 Noyes St?

hint: Types of Insurance

If the building was flipped upside down, the **building** would be the things that stay in place, like the walls, pipes, floor, and windows. Your business’s **personal property** would be the things that fall, like tables, chairs, computers, and phones.

validation.pattern: Please enter a dollar amount without cents.

questions.question: How many __square feet__ does your business __occupy__ at 912 Noyes St?
What is the __replacement cost__ of your business’s __personal property__ at 912 Noyes St?

hint: Types of Insurance

If the building was flipped upside down, the **building** would be the things that stay in place, like the walls, pipes, floor, and windows. Your business’s **personal property** would be the things that fall, like tables, chairs, computers, and phones.
Limit may vary based on carrier appetite, please review quote carefully.

validation.pattern: Please enter a dollar amount without cents.

questions.question: Select the closest option for the __materials used to construct the building__ at 912 Noyes St:

hint: Building Construction
**Frame** Wood framed sides, wood framed roof.
**Joisted Masonry** Brick/Masonry framed sides, wood framed roof.
**Non-Combustible** Metal sides, metal framed roof.
**Masonry Non-Combustible** Brick/Masonry sides, metal framed roof.
**Modified Fire Resistive** Brick/Masonry sides, Brick/Masonry framed roof (at least 1 Hour fire resistance rating).
**Fire Resistive** Brick/Masonry sides, Brick/Masonry framed roof (at least 2 Hour fire resistance rating).

questions.question: What type of fire alarm is in the building at 912 Noyes St?

hint: Fire Alarm Types
Local Alarm: Sets off a bell, siren and/or a strobe light in close proximity to the condition that caused the alarm to go off.
Central Station: This type of system will also notify a main panel somewhere in the building (usually the lobby).

Monitored System - by Monitoring Company: This type of Central Station system will also notify a monitoring company who may then respond to the alarm themselves or notify the Fire/Police Department in an effort to decrease the response time to the condition that caused the alarm to go off.

Monitored System - by Fire/Police Department: This type of Central Station system will also notify the Fire/Police Department directly in an effort to decrease the response time to the condition that caused the alarm to go off.

questions.question: What are your business’s __estimated revenue or gross sales__ over the next 12 months at 912 Noyes St?

hint: Estimated revenue or gross sales

If your business is primarily compensated by commissions (like a real estate agent or travel agent), estimate the total value of your business’s commissions, not the total value of the sales which these commissions are based on.
Include any government subsidies and charitable donations or contributions (if applicable).

validation.pattern: Please enter a dollar amount without cents.
